Invoke Methods

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Node»GrowableFunction»ObjectFunction. View the class hierarchy.

MethodDescription
Disconnect From ControlDisconnects the invoke node from a control. Details
Link To ControlLinks the invoke node to the control you specify. The link to the control is available only when you do not wire data to the Reference input. If you wire data to the Reference input, LabVIEW returns an error. Details
Set MethodSets the method of the invoke node. Details
